name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blockreward - Earn Crypto & Gift Card Rewards

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn crypto & gift card rewards with a click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add the Blockreward Extension to your browser and connect your Blockreward account to start earning rewards directly through the extension, without having to log in again.

Blockreward is a free rewards app that lets you earn crypto and gift card rewards for completing simple online activities such as taking surveys, trying apps, watching videos and more.

WELCOME BONUS:
✨ No account yet? Get up to 10,000 reward points when you sign up now.

HOW TO CONNECT:
1. On the Blockreward web app, go to Account > Blockreward Extension.
2. Copy your Connect ID.
3. Open the Blockreward Extension. Enter your Connect ID and click Connect.

FEATURES:
🎁 Earn rewards with a click of a button, without having to log in to Blockreward
✅ Access and complete surveys directly through the extension
📣 Easily copy & share your referral link to earn more points
💰 Keep track of your total balance
⚡ View the latest promotions and updates
